patch:
diff --git a/icu4c/source/i18n/cecal.cpp b/icu4c/source/i18n/cecal.cpp
index b550684b798..c43f7946af6 100644
--- a/icu4c/source/i18n/cecal.cpp
+++ b/icu4c/source/i18n/cecal.cpp
@@ -115,7 +115,8 @@ CECalendar::jdToCE(int32_t julianDay, int32_t jdEpochOffset, int32_t& year, int3
     int32_t c4; // number of 4 year cycle (1461 days)
     int32_t r4; // remainder of 4 year cycle, always positive
 
-    c4 = ClockMath::floorDivide(julianDay - jdEpochOffset, 1461, &r4);
+    int64_t adjustedJulianDay = static_cast<int64_t>(julianDay) - static_cast<int64_t>(jdEpochOffset);
+    c4 = ClockMath::floorDivide(static_cast<int32_t>(adjustedJulianDay), 1461, &r4);
 
     year = 4 * c4 + (r4/365 - r4/1460); // 4 * <number of 4year cycle> + <years within the last cycle>
